title: Rename and update fleet image for Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C

requirements.text: Update the Fleet vehicle represented by the selected image element (/html/body/div/div/main/section[2]/div/div[5]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) so it displays as “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” and uses a dedicated Saloon 4C image asset (instead of the current Coaster 4C image), by updating the corresponding entry in fleet data.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Fleet section under “Group & Commercial Transport”, the vehicle card currently showing “Toyota Coaster 4C” now shows the name exactly “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C”.
The card image for this vehicle loads from a new static asset path under /assets/generated (and is not reusing /assets/generated/car-coaster-4c.dim_1200x800.jpg).
The alt text for this card matches the updated vehicle name (via vehicle.name).
The booking form “Select Car” dropdown includes “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” (reflecting the updated fleet data).

constraints: Apply the change only to the vehicle corresponding to the selected Fleet card image element; do not alter other fleet vehicle cards.
Store any new image under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference it via a /assets/generated/... path (no backend image routing).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not add new vehicle types beyond updating the existing Coaster 4C entry to Saloon 4C.
Do not change site theme, layout, SEO copy, or backend booking logic as part of this change.

required: Premium minibus photo of a Toyota Coaster Saloon (front 3/4 angle), clean background, high contrast, realistic style (car-coaster-saloon-4c.dim_1200x800.jpg)
